channel.title: How to add ancients/lunar spells/vengance
channel.description:
ok so i'm using GangstaScape blank source, and it dosen't have anything.. i was wondering if anyone out their could help me with adding ancients spells.
i have the altar, but i need to know how to add them, like when i click on the altar and i convert to ancient magics..i've tried several times.
as lunar, i have the Guthix Altar, i just need to make it so when i click on it i convert to lunars.
and after lunars i need vengance. i have tried tons of times to add vengance onto other server..but i can't get it :(..sum1 help me plz? thanks!
